event.title: Social event in ZÃ¼rich - meet the FSFE!
event.body:
This year's General Assembly of FSFE takes place in Zurich, and as usual, there will be a social event where the members of the General Assembly meet Fellows and other local Free Software supporters.
Around 18:20 the crowd will leave from the FSFE office at Sumatrastrasse 25 and walk through the old town in direction to Bellview.
At 19:00 we will catch a ferry from Zurich Burkiplatz.
At 19:47 the ferry will arrive in Erlenbach where we will continue the evening with a nice barbecue in the park. If you decide to join us directly for the barbecue look for the fellowship flag to locate us.
Bring whatever you want to put on the grill and drinks to last you until 23:00 when we will conclude the social evening as some of us have to wake up early on Sunday to continue working :)
